parameters.name: Jimmy W - Midi Canoe - 04 Mr Cogito's Last Dream
Jimmy W - Midi Canoe - 04 Mr Cogito's Last Dream

parameters: I keep having the same dreams. Plagued by visions of
of wars and pestilence that ravage the land.\. I see the
people weeping, their hearts heavy with grief,\.
and I feel their pain as if it were my own.
The weight of their sorrow crushes me,\.
and I am powerless to stop the endless cycle of suffering.
a nightmare that haunts me every night,\.
and I'm scared it will never end.

parameters.name: Jimmy W - Midi Canoe - 04 Mr Cogito's Last Dream

parameters: I dream of darkness and sorrow, of a world without hope.\.
In my sleep,\. I am gnawed at by a sense of guilt
if I have brought about some terrible fate that cannot
be undone then the weight of my burden is too much to bear.
I am left to wonder if there is any way to escape.

parameters.name: Jimmy W - Midi Canoe - 04 Mr Cogito's Last Dream

parameters: I suspect these events are not entirely my own doing.\.
Someone or something has been manipulating me,\.
forcing me to bear the weight of their own misdeeds.\.
I can't shake the feeling of guilt that consumes me.
Have I been a pawn in someone else's game,\. or am I truly
responsible for the suffering that I have witnessed?
The answers elude me,\. even in my dreams.

parameters.name: Jimmy W - Midi Canoe - 04 Mr Cogito's Last Dream
